name: just-html
description: I want to see how to use Webpack in all 3 scenarios: (1) Just on the client side with no HTTP server, i.e. just HTML pages with CSS and JavaScript, perhaps some pre-processing with SASS, but complicated scenarios where I want different bundles comprising of different files, each to be included in a different page. (2) With node as the server; (3) With ASP.NET MVC as the server. This is the first of the three scenarios.
author: Sathyaish Chakravarthy
